entry.title: Yet another blocklimit proposal / compromise
entry.summary: The discussion began with Marcel Jamin proposing an assessment of the current block limit to determine what is technically possible without increasing the cost of running a node too much. However, Jorge Tim√≥n raised concerns about the risk of further mining centralization. In response to this, someone suggested that the overlap between people who want to run a serious mining operation and those who cannot afford an above-average internet connection is very small.
